str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A tree. Probably from drus; a tree.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
Probably from the base of harpazo; fruit, literally or figuratively.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Rotten, useless, corrupt, depraved. From sepo; rotten, i.e. Worthless.
A tree. Probably from drus; a tree.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Probably from the base of harpazo; fruit, literally or figuratively.
